sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; const PostJob = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ jobTitle: '', company: '', location: '', jobType: '', workMode: '', experience: '', salary: '', currency: 'USD', jobDescription: '', requirements: '', skills: '', benefits: '', applicationDeadline: '', contactEmail: '', contactPhone: '', companyWebsite: '', department: '', educationLevel: '' }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Job posting data:', formData); // Handle form submission here alert('Job posted successfully!'); }; const handleReset = () => { setFormData({ jobTitle: '', company: '', location: '', jobType: '', workMode: '', experience: '', salary: '', currency: 'USD', jobDescription: '', requirements: '', skills: '', benefits: '', applicationDeadline: '', contactEmail: '', contactPhone: '', companyWebsite: '', department: '', educationLevel: '' }); }; return (
Post a New Job
{/* Basic Job Information */}
Basic Information
{/* Job Type and Work Mode */}
{/* Salary Information */}
Compensation
{/* Job Description */}
Job Details
{/* Application Details */}
Application Details
{/* Submit Buttons */}
); }; export default PostJob;
